name: Thy PrBoom Maps
description: Thy PrBoom Maps was to be a 1 man made megawad (all maps done by me) but that failed, then I tried to make it a community project but that failed so in the end I canned the whole thing and will just release the cancelled wad for sake of closure. It adds new textures, music, maps and sprites (and a new weapon over the pistol slot) and if anyone wants to finish what I started then go ahead. 17 out of 32 maps were complete (16 regular, 1 secret) and it would be a shame just to abandon them.
